archimate:Requirement.name: SD.2.5.7d: d) stress testing/volume testing (i.e. subjecting the system to large volumes of data to assess the performance under abnormal loads) to identify the maximum system capacity.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
